com.intel.realsense.tracking

Interface TrackingDevice


  • public interface TrackingDevice

    Tracking Device Interface

    Exposes basic controls of the tracking device.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TrackingDevice.ControllerDiscoveryListener 
      static interface  TrackingDevice.ErrorListener 
      static interface  TrackingDevice.Info 
      static interface  TrackingDevice.RawSampleListener 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Releases all resources related to this device.
      void enableControllers(int numberOfControllers, TrackingDevice.ControllerDiscoveryListener listener)
      Enables the controllers.
      void enableRawStreams(java.util.List<StreamProfile> profiles, TrackingDevice.RawSampleListener listener)
      Enables streaming of raw data.
      void enableTracking(PoseListener listener)
      Enables 6DoF tracking.
      TrackingDevice.Info getInfo()
      Gets device info.
      MotionModuleIntrinsics getMotionModuleIntrinsics(SensorType sensorType, int sensorIndex)
      Returns the intrinsic parameters of an individual motion module in the device.

      Returns a list of supported raw streams profiles.
      java.util.List<TrackingTemperature> getTemperature()

      java.util.List<byte[]> readAssociatedDevices()

      Starts the enabled feature.

    • Method Detail

      • readAssociatedDevices

        java.util.List<byte[]> readAssociatedDevices()
                                      throws TrackingException
        Read associated devices reads the associated controller mac addresses (6 bytes each) from the device EEPROM.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - if the request failed.

      • writeAssociatedDevices

        void writeAssociatedDevices(byte[] controller1MacAddress,
                            byte[] controller2MacAddress)
                     throws TrackingException
        Write Associated Devices writes the details of associated controllers to the device EEPROM.
        Parameters:
        controller1MacAddress - controller 1, 6 bytes mac address
        controller2MacAddress - controller 2, 6 bytes mac address
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.

      • getSupportedRawStreamProfiles

        java.util.List<StreamProfile> getSupportedRawStreamProfiles()
        Returns a list of supported raw streams profiles.
        Returns:
        List of supported StreamProfile.

      • enableRawStreams

        void enableRawStreams(java.util.List<StreamProfile> profiles,
                      TrackingDevice.RawSampleListener listener)
               throws TrackingException
        Enables streaming of raw data.
        Parameters:
        profiles - the profiles to enable.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if called after start(ErrorListener).

      • enableTracking

        void enableTracking(PoseListener listener)
             throws TrackingException
        Enables 6DoF tracking. This configuration is reset on stop().
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if called after start(ErrorListener).

      • enableControllers

        void enableControllers(int numberOfControllers,
                       TrackingDevice.ControllerDiscoveryListener listener)
                throws TrackingException
        Enables the controllers. The device will keep the scanning active until the requested number of controllers are connected. To disable controllers, execute enableControllers with numberOfControllers equals 0. This configuration is reset on stop().
        Parameters:
        numberOfControllers - the number of controllers.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if called after start(ErrorListener).

      • start

        void start(TrackingDevice.ErrorListener listener)
    throws TrackingException
        Starts the enabled feature.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ErrorListener object which handles the tracking device errors.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws TrackingException
        Stops tracking.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if called before start(ErrorListener).

      • getInfo

        TrackingDevice.Info getInfo()
        Gets device info.
        Returns:
        an instance of TrackingDevice.Info.

      • getTemperature

        java.util.List<TrackingTemperature> getTemperature()
                                            throws TrackingException
        Returns temperature and temperature threshold from all temperature sensors (VPU, IMU, BLE)
        Returns:
        List of supported TrackingTemperature.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.

      • setTemperatureThreshold

        void setTemperatureThreshold(TemperatureSensor sensor,
                             float temperatureThreshold)
                      throws TrackingException
        Set temperature threshold to requested sensor. When the temperature reach the threshold, all running algorithms and sensors will stop (as if stop was called) This configuration is reset on stop().
        Parameters:
        sensor - the sensor to set temperature threshold for.
        temperatureThreshold - temperature threshold of the relevant temperature sensor.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.

      • getMotionModuleIntrinsics

        MotionModuleIntrinsics getMotionModuleIntrinsics(SensorType sensorType,
                                                 int sensorIndex)
                                          throws TrackingException
        Returns the intrinsic parameters of an individual motion module in the device.
        Parameters:
        sensorType - the sensor type to get the intrinsic parameters for.
        sensorIndex - the sensor index to get the intrinsic parameters for.
        Returns:
        an instance of MotionModuleIntrinsics.
        Throws:
        TrackingException - in case the request failed.

      • close

        void close()
        Releases all resources related to this device.
